Biography: Dr. Jia Jia is a tenure professor in Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University. She got bachelor degree at Tsinghua University in 2003, and received her Ph.D. degree from Tsinghua University in 2008. Research Interests Her main research interest is digital avatar synthesis, affective computing and human computer speech interaction.
